Once placed, the item can no longer be put up for sale. <var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>The following may also result in loss of certain parts and furnishings: - The removal of said item by another player - Leaving or being discharged from the free company - Unsharing an estate - The demolition of an estate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Are you certain you wish to proceed?
